agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: State Affairs TIME & DATE: upon adjournment or during reading and referral if permission granted Wednesday, April 10, 2019 PLACE: 3W.3 CHAIR: Rep. Dade Phelan SB 22 Campbell | et al. Relating to prohibiting certain transactions between a governmental entity and an abortion provider or affiliate of the provider. SB 1152 Hancock Relating to the payment of certain fees to municipalities by entities that provide telecommunications and cable or video services. Notice of this meeting was announced from the house floor.
